summary: Jerry and Pete are two friends with no money, looking for some job. They finally find one as workers in a circus, but Jerry has different dreams. He wants to become a clown.

keywords: circus|character has same name as actor|crosley automobile|circus performer|handicapped child
title: El rey del circo
